project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program to perform basic data analysis, including calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns in a CSV file.

task.name: Implement function to calculate mean for numerical columns
Implement function to calculate median for numerical columns
Implement function to calculate mode for numerical columns
Implement user interface for inputting column names
Write tests for all implemented functions
Execute tests to verify the correctness of all functionalities
